website_summaries.verdict: A good value for its price, this is a versatile set that provides lots of options.
pros: Users love the different barrels and wands that allow them to create a variety of looks
It stands out for having easy-to-change barrels and maintaining its temperature well
We love that the curls will last and hold their shape
Travelers also appreciate the dual voltage feature
cons: It doesn't have a protective tip on either the iron or wands, so use caution and the provided glove when using

website_summaries.verdict: This 5-in-1 offers plenty of options for a versatility in hair styles, all for a great price.
pros: You'll eliminate the need for multiple products and will have shiny and longlasting curls for a finished and smooth look
cons: Some customer complaints about longevity of the heat mechanism

customer_reviews.title: The product was nicely packaged. Within the box
customer_reviews.text: The shipping was fast. The product was nicely packaged. Within the box, I recieved a 50% off next purchase coupon. In my opinion, the curlers and wands heat up pretty quickly...within 2 mnts ( I've had curlers that'll take longer) The get very hot so a heat protecter spray/oil and heat resistant glove is highly suggested. My only con is that they're quite hard to pull away from the attachment & it seems like it takes them forever to cool off once shut off. Overall the product is good, curls are beautiful, & i would recommend them.
customer_reviews.author: BrxJxy

customer_reviews.title: Hairstylist and these are awesome
customer_reviews.text: I'm a hairstylist and I ordered these Wands online praying they would be as good as everyone else reviewed them to be. And I LOVE them. It gets hot fast, and cools down fast too. Just be careful to only hold the handle otherwise you can burn yourself. I am overall very happy with this purchase.
customer_reviews.author: dominique desiree friend

customer_reviews.title: Don’t buy this!!!!
customer_reviews.text: Hands down the worst curling iron I have ever used. I have easy to curl hair and struggled with this. Not only did the curls immediately fall out my hair looked damaged and overall looked worse afterwards. I’ve used $10 curling wands and irons and had a better outcome. Doesn’t have a cool tip which is major and doesn’t hold your hair in place well which causes your ends to slip and then look horrid and bent. Waste of money. I thought it would be fine as long as I used the glove. I should have saved my money on this and just payed extra for a curling wand system that’s 4x the price at sephora.
customer_reviews.author: ScarRo0430

customer_reviews.title: Broken and no replacement
customer_reviews.text: The first two months were great....however the third month the 1” barrel stopped heating. The others worked, but the one size I use the most is now useless. The produce comes with a warrenty, however after reaching out to the manufacturer three times, providing the information and product order number they have yet to send a replacement, 9 months the after the initial request. So, all in all: if the barrel works they curl well, but don’t bank on a warranty, good customer service, or replacement.
customer_reviews.author: Michael K.

customer_reviews.title: Great Customer Support
customer_reviews.text: My wife recieved this curling iron set, and it had an error code on the LED screen. We called the manufacturer customer service number that was on the owners manual. Easy to deal with, 10 minute phone call, and they had a new one to us in 2 days, and it had no problems. I appreciate a company that stands behind there product, and they did. She says the curling iron is way better than her old one, so I guess thats good too.
customer_reviews.author: TEK1

customer_reviews.title: Not the best quality
customer_reviews.text: I've had this set for two months now. It was an ok set. It's a little clumsy and doesn't sit on the counter right. I burned myself a few times before I got the feel of them. I thought for the money it was a great deal. I really liked being able to switch the pieces which is really easy to do. Unfortunately the screws/pins that hold the spring lever to the barrel started coming out of my favorite attachment. Then it happened to the second one. I love the idea of these and they make great curls but the quality makes me wish i had spent a bit more on something else.
customer_reviews.author: PeachSneers

customer_reviews.title: Not great for fine hair -- slips right out of curling iron
customer_reviews.text: I wouldn't recommend this product if you have thin or fine hair. My hair is pretty fine -- there's a lot of it, but the strands are thin -- and my hair just falls out of the curling iron. The clip doesn't hold it at all. So, I'm only able to use the 2 wands. :/ Pretty disappointed because I purchased this specifically for the irons, I already own a wand that I prefer over this one.
customer_reviews.author: Jessica Carter

customer_reviews.title: Completely stopped working 3 days after the return window closed!
customer_reviews.text: I loved this for the few weeks that it actually worked. Beautiful curls and I got so many compliments on my hair when I used it. But then it just started shutting off randomly...I’d have to turn it on a few times before it would actually heat up. And now? It won’t heat up or work at all! A mere 3 days outside the return window! Boo, Amazon! I had only used it a few times and am very disappointed!
customer_reviews.author: ArtMuseLit

customer_reviews.title: Great for adding body to flat fine hair
customer_reviews.text: I love this set, the adjustable heat and the ability to switch barrels is just what I wanted. The heat safe bag is nice for travel, but the barrels cool quickly so I haven't really needed it. With a little product, the curls stay all day, which with my fine hair is a miracle. I would give it 5 stars but the clipless barrels don't have kickstands on them and they roll all over my counter, on more than one occasion they've rolled off the edge of my vanity and almost burnt my toes.
customer_reviews.author: K. Gwynn

customer_reviews.title: This awesome curling iron replaces my old one! Love how it's 5 irons into 1!!!
customer_reviews.text: My sister introduced me to this curling iron. I love the fact it's 5 irons in one. The attachments are awesome for different waves and curl styles. My favorite is the largest barrel size as it gives me the look I want with my long hair. Heats up fast and comes with glove so you don't burn yourself. So far, I haven't had to use it...got enough practice on the first go around. Comes in nice zip travel case, nicely boxed upon arrival. Love it so much, I ordered one for my teenage daughter for Christmas. Can't beat the price, something like this normally goes for $100 and up, this is a steal deal for a quality curling iron product!
customer_reviews.author: Lea P.

customer_reviews.title: Nice so far
customer_reviews.text: 7/25/16. Satin Wave 5-in-1 Curling Wand with Temperature Control - Professional Curling Iron Set Fast shipping. First impressions seems very nice classy set. Seems well made, packaging is very nice, even the outside box. Gotta read up more on this when turning on the green temperature light flashes the temp. But doesn't stay on? Again I need to read Manuel. Will do update once used few times Update 7/
customer_reviews.author: SportyTracy

customer_reviews.title: Easy to get burned
customer_reviews.text: Pros: The product does work. Heats up fast and maintains a steady heat. It is nice the heads are interchangeable. A great selection of heat ends to work with to get quite a variety of curl. Cons: Super easy to burn yourself. The handle is not easy to grip and you constantly hit the buttons which often turns the curling wand off. None of the heat ends have cool tips to help grip, it is very easy to burn yourself. The stands for some of the larger heat ends are very loose and are constantly getting tangled in my hair. So frustrated I am looking to donate and find a different product.
customer_reviews.author: SJR

customer_reviews.title: Loved it while it lasted
customer_reviews.text: I bought the Xtava curling iron set for myself about a year ago and I loved it but the main wand stopped working after a couple of months with light use. It would turn on, blink for 10 seconds then turn off. I asked for a new set, as a gift, for Christmas and same thing happened. I got one month of use before the new set died again. So frustrating because I love the versatility of this wand set but the longevity is what is lacking.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Personally did not like it.
customer_reviews.text: Ok, first off, I really wanted to like this as it has multiple heads and appears good quality. I will openly admit that my 3 stars is somewhat personal as apparently, I am unable to have a curling iron without an end on it to hold. I really tried but after burning myself for the 5th time, I gave up and will return this. Personal preference but important to me. The reason for 3 stars is this AND the fact that the upper part of the plastic handle also got uncomfortably hot even on the lower settings after 10 minutes of use.
customer_reviews.author: Gem

customer_reviews.title: Good Value for the $$$$
customer_reviews.text: I really like this set. Comes with several different wands for different type curls. It's easy to use & changing from one wand to another is very easy. I love that it heats up fast & cools down very quickly. I give this 4 stars & not five because I don't like where the controls are. I am constantly hitting the off button or decrease the temperature while curling my hair. As much as I try not to.... I still manage to hit one of the buttons. It's still a good buying choice.
customer_reviews.author: Villa

customer_reviews.title: Terrible electrical wiring - faulty product
customer_reviews.text: Was very excited about this product being that it had multiple attachments which only means TONS of capability for styling but upon attempting to use the product I let it heat up to the temperature indicated and heard a pop and it never turned back on.. this product had terrible electrical wiring from my very limited time with it. Working on getting refund now.. after I had already tossed the package it came in so now I have to waste money and time paying for supplies to return it and go find UPS. ugh..
customer_reviews.author: jorge contreras

customer_reviews.title: 2 Years Later
customer_reviews.text: I have had this curling iron set for two years now and its still holding on steady. I vary between the different barrels which is easy to do since its click in and out. For all the reviews complaining that it's easy to burn yourself... Well... It's a curling iron with a max temp of 410 degrees F. So.. Yeah. Curling your own hair can be difficult and should be done with caution and care to avoid burns. This came with a glove when a bought it which I have since lost but really never used. This curling iron has it going on!
customer_reviews.author: Rebecca Lishefski

customer_reviews.title: So many options!
customer_reviews.text: This curling iron is AMAZING!!! I recently got a super short cut so I wasn’t sure what size iron to buy, this solved all those problems! It’s so easy to switch sizes (definitely after they have cooled, I would NOT recommend trying it midway through styling). I really liked that I could see the temperature display and it came with a heat resistant glove! GREAT value for the price!
customer_reviews.author: Elyse

customer_reviews.title: HATE THIS CURLING IRON
customer_reviews.text: Worst curling iron I've ever used. The tension on the spring in the handle is too loose and hair won't stay clamped in place - it just slides right out when you start to twist the wand. Also, there is no cool tip on the end for you to hold when making a curl. It comes with a glove that's supposed to be used so you can handle the end of the wand, but this is a terrible idea. I can't separate a strand of hair for curling with a glove on my hand. How hard would it have been to put a tip on these wands...couldn't send it back fast enough.
customer_reviews.author: Janis Taylor

customer_reviews.title: abso-friggin-lutely love it
customer_reviews.text: i abso-friggin-lutely love this curling iron. it’s a decent price and works like magic. i love that it comes with different tips. i have thick coarse short brown hair, not ideal for curling, and this curler did the trick. it gets extremely hot (obviously), but might run a bit hotter than the temperature says it will. the cord is oddly longer than i would’ve expected, but i don’t mind it as the iron itself was an amazing buy.
customer_reviews.author: Mushroom

customer_reviews.title: Weird buzzing sound
customer_reviews.text: My Xtava set worked fine the first few times I used it. However, when styling a client’s hair I noticed it was making a weird buzzing sound. My fears were that it would stop working in the middle of doing someone’s hair, that it would electrocute me or someone else, or that it would burn someone’s hair. I once had a Sally Beauty curling iron burn out on me in the middle of doing a client’s hair years ago and couldn’t take that risk again. Sent this item back for return.
customer_reviews.author: Maria

customer_reviews.title: Great Iron...Not for the Faint of Heart
customer_reviews.text: So I would have given this 5 stars except... there is no tip on the end. (Hence 4 stars) That being said, it is by far the Best Iron I have ever used! I have had it for about month, I did get a burn, no tip but pain makes us learn quickly! It heats up very fast. Max temp. is 410* thou 350* is plenty for me. The iron is rather heavy COMPARED to others... still great! My 74 yr. young Mom tried it out and it was just too cumbersome for her. All in all I would buy it again!
customer_reviews.author: Winter

customer_reviews.title: Great Iron/Wand makes beautful curls and waves
customer_reviews.text: I liked how many barrels this product offered so I bought it. It does everything described, however, I was used to my last curling iron having a rubber tip that you could touch when styling your hair. I was so used to it that the first time I used the curling iron I grabbed the tip like my old iron and burned my fingers. As for the wands, I hadn't had any experience with those, I would recommend practicing with them with the iron off to avoid burning yourself. Even with the glove on touching the iron you can feel the heat.
customer_reviews.author: cquinn300

customer_reviews.title: Great set!
customer_reviews.text: I love these! Very versatile and easy to use. At first I couldn’t figure them out but changing the heads is actually super easy, you just have to make sure the head IS ALL THE WAY DOWN (takes a lot of force before you break them in) then just lock it. I love how long the cord is too! The glove works but I don’t like using it too often because I’m not used to it (my mom uses it a lot though). Only four stars though because the clamping mechanism on one of the heads broke; the skew came out (totally fixable).
customer_reviews.author: Genie

customer_reviews.title: Perfect
customer_reviews.text: My wife loves this thing. And man does it get hot. She has thick dark hair and it will give her curls that last all day. Said it's the best one she's ever had and she has had some expensive ones. This thing is a year old and still going strong. Her friends offer tell her when they are getting ready for a special event to bring hers over. Some have went and bought their own.
customer_reviews.author: Robert B. Barnett

customer_reviews.title: Super Fast
customer_reviews.text: This product is so versatile and works like a charm. With so many pieces you can do a lot. The only issue are the buttons. They are super sensitive and directly on the area where you rest your finger tips. I've accidentally hit the power button or the heat setting to go either up or down. But the heat itself is so consistent and quick its been super reliable and the best hair tool I've ever had. I really do recommend this as it is a great price for the amount of tools you get.
customer_reviews.author: Izzy

customer_reviews.title: Love it!
customer_reviews.text: Very versatile product for a variety different hair styles/curls. I like the case it comes with for all of the attachments...it's especially nice for storage and traveling! The attachments are pretty easy to put on and remove. This is actually the 2nd one I purchased because my teenage daughter took my 1st one to college with her, so obviously I liked it enough to purchase it twice!
customer_reviews.author: BEACHBUM

customer_reviews.title: Love it!
customer_reviews.text: This curling iron is absolutely gorgeous! I loved the packaging and the bag to store everything. Very very stylish! My only issue is my hair is long and I’m having a hard time getting use to the clamp & also it’s not long enough (the actual wand) but other then that, I love the volume it gives and the different styles it comes with. Some have a clamp others don’t!
customer_reviews.author: Larocks

customer_reviews.title: Not the right curling iron for me
customer_reviews.text: I'm not very good at fixing my hair! because using a flat iron or throwing it up in a messy bun. I ordered this because I liked all of the different size options that it came with. Unfortunately, I didn't read that the curling iron attachments don't have cool touch ends. I had to return it because curling my hair is hard enough for me without having to wear a glove on one hand! It seemed like a quality product and got hot very quickly but it just wasn't the right product for me.
customer_reviews.author: Carrie U

customer_reviews.title: Harder to use than I expected
customer_reviews.text: I really wanted to like this product but I have had this now for over a year and barely use it. It is actually kind of a pain to change out the irons and the larger barrels (which is what I bought it for) seem to leave a little kink in my hair. I really should have just stuck with normal wants and curling irons.
customer_reviews.author: Jenny VDSCO

customer_reviews.title: WOW
customer_reviews.text: My hair is fine and pretty tough to get it to hold a curl. I’ve used several hair curlers and have never really liked any one in particular. I usually have to put hairspray to keep a curl for a few hours because my hair straightens out so quickly. I used this and WOW! Usually, my hair comes out frizzy and dried after curling. With the xtava, my curls stay WITHOUT hairsprays or any products. Also, the curls last for two to three days. I’m amazed. My hair is shiny and soft, and no stiff hairspray required.
customer_reviews.author: Jane

customer_reviews.title: Professional Curls and Affordable!
customer_reviews.text: These are the best curlers ever at an even better price. I use them about 4 times a week and flawless curls every time. They have a swivel plug thing so you don't have to worry about burning the cord. Good temperature and the glove is handy.. I don't know why it took me soo long to discover these!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: I'm dumb and have burned myself more than I want to ...
customer_reviews.text: WARNING: This sucker gets HOT. I am not used to not having a plastic piece at the end of the curler, so I've gotten to where I have to actually put the glove on the wand while it's warming up so I don't forget to put it on. Yes, I'm dumb and have burned myself more than I want to admit. It does it's job. The curls do stay put for longer than other curlers I've used, but I wish it had a temp control. One of these days I might end up like that youtube girl.
customer_reviews.author: RR

customer_reviews.title: Great curlers
customer_reviews.text: This purchase was a gift to my wife. She seems to use it almost everyday now and has used this on our 4-year-old daughter's hair (with a lower temperature setting) a few times as well. She isn't used to the heatless tip NOT being there and hasn't used the glove yet, she says it seems a bit of a hassle and she can learn to remember this isn't like the last curling iron she had. She enjoys the versatility of this and the results are very cute. I will say as the gift she was not sure what the box of shiny, long, varying-width objects were and a little surprised to be getting something like that!
customer_reviews.author: Brian J. Ramage

customer_reviews.title: Very good
customer_reviews.text: Very good product so far. The curlers and wands heat up pretty quickly...within 2 minutes. Shipping was fast and the product was nicely packaged. They get very hot so you need to be careful with the curlers. I love it
customer_reviews.author: Lourdes María Liu

customer_reviews.title: 10 OUT OF 10!!!
customer_reviews.text: 10 out of 10! For the price, YOU CANNOT GO WRONG!!! I used the wand today and my hair looks gorgeous. It’s bouncy, soft, shiny! This curler is FIRE! GET IT! I’m so excited to use the other sized! If you’ve never used a wand, do yourself a favor and use the glove...and keep it on, for your own safety!
customer_reviews.author: Molly

customer_reviews.title: Broke instantly
customer_reviews.text: Cheap cheap cheap. Took it out of the box, put on a wand and the spring on the hinge fell out and now it won't clamp shut. I then tried inserting a different wand but the first one is stuck. So much for the lock and unlock button since they don't work either. Returning it before even using it.
customer_reviews.author: FluffyPickles

customer_reviews.title: Quit working!! Don't purchase!
customer_reviews.text: I have had this curling iron less than 90 days and it stopped heating up. Would not recommend. UPDATE: After my initial problem, I was contacted by customer service. I was able to return the broken curling iron and they set me a new one. Excellent customer service. The new curling iron is working great.
customer_reviews.author: Crystal Klepetko

customer_reviews.title: Works ok
customer_reviews.text: Pro: These heat up and it's nice how many different size attachments there are. The quality feels pretty decent for the price and the carry bag is nice for traveling. Con: I've never been able to get the curling irons to "lock" into the base. I've only used them a handful of times and after a while it kept shutting off on me. I'm not sure if it overheated or is defective. I don't know how reliable it is.
customer_reviews.author: mctegla

customer_reviews.title: GREAT QUALITY AT GREAT PRICE!
customer_reviews.text: I have not used this wand yet but received it today and was already impressed by the packaging and quality of this product. I have a roller brush from xtava and love it! I’m sure this wand with adjustable heat settings will be amazing also. This wand also comes with a super cute convenient travel/storage bag so you don’t have to have the wand and the 5 attachments laying around taking up space on your counter. Also included a heat glove. I’ll update after using this product.
customer_reviews.author: Blondie

customer_reviews.title: Great Curling Iron
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my teen daughter who has extremely difficult to curl hair. I used the 2 larger barrels and they were perfect. I did not have to use the supplied glove for the 2 barrels which both have clamps. I appreciate the different temperature settings for different types of hair. It is easy to change out the barrels (when cool, of course). It heats up quickly and comes in a nice bag for travel or storage. Overall, I would recommend this curling iron especially for the price!
customer_reviews.author: Mother of two

customer_reviews.title: BEST CURLS EVER
customer_reviews.text: My hair has never been good at holding curls no matter what I use but with this my hair stays curled all day long! It even looks great the next day. I have really only used the largest wand, but just 4-5 seconds on each strand and I have curls that last all day! I have also used the largest curling iron; takes about 10-15 seconds to get a good curl and doesn't last all day, but still lasts longer than any other curling iron I have ever used.
customer_reviews.author: Heather Harper

customer_reviews.title: Too Hot!
customer_reviews.text: I thought I wouldn't mind, but I actually find myself frequently wishing it had a temperature control dial or something of that nature. Gets way too hot for my hair and the clips sometimes leave awkward heat lines in my hair. Can't use for too long before I have to unplug it to let it cool down. Very inconvenient. Great price though and works fine if you don't curl your hair very often. But if you do, I would suggest just investing in something that has more heat control.
customer_reviews.author: Agift

customer_reviews.title: Good curling iron, no temperature control !
customer_reviews.text: This curling iron works great, I love all the options I have with only having to purchase 1 set, I give 3 stars because there is not a temperature control and tends to get a little hotter than I would like it to, also the handle seems to get quite hot making it slightly uncomfortable to hold on to.
customer_reviews.author: CDBartle

customer_reviews.title: Breaks down quickly
customer_reviews.text: This is an okay set to get. Heats up fast and curls my hard to curl hair at low-ish temperature. I’ve had this for nearly a year and a half, and while I don’t use it every day, I do use it about three times a week. This past week the largest barrel started losing pins. The foot rest thing fell off, which was okay. Today, however, the clip to the barrel fell off too. For paying as much as I did I would think that it would last longer than a year and a half
customer_reviews.author: natasha garza

customer_reviews.title: I love this curling iron
customer_reviews.text: I love this curling iron! It heats up quickly, has multiple temperature settings and the attachments are easy to switch. I bought this curling iron for a trip to Italy because it has dual voltage and heard horror stories of people using their curling irons with converters only to have their hair burned off. While I had to use an adapter for the plug, the curling iron performed perfect on their electric system. Couldn't be happier! I use it almost every day.
customer_reviews.author: Michele McTeague

customer_reviews.title: Fails to hold hair around the barrel!
customer_reviews.text: I like everything about the product except that the clip that holds the hair against the barrel on the larger cylinder is not tight enough to hold the hair. It slips right out. It looks like it closes against the barrel but obviously it doesn’t so it is useless to me. If I used the smaller barrel I would give it 5 stars.
customer_reviews.author: barbreads

customer_reviews.title: Great curling iron...glove no so much.
customer_reviews.text: I've only had this a week, so time will tell, but I love it so far. I like that I have so many options for sizes. The one downside is the glove that it comes with. It doesn't seem to protect much from the heat of the curling iron. I quickly learned I couldn't just grab the curling iron with this glove. It only helped if I accidentally touched my hand. I would like a glove that I could grab the end of the curling iron with.
customer_reviews.author: Sara

customer_reviews.title: Space Saving, Great Value
customer_reviews.text: I really love this product. All of these attachments are great and I love having all of those options without taking up much space. Comes in a great pouch and very easy to use. Not sure if it's a user malfunction, but it is worth mentioning that the attachments can be a little tricky to completely lock into the handle. However, I have never ever had any of the attachments fall out of the handle while using. Would definitely buy again!
customer_reviews.author: Madeline R.

customer_reviews.title: Great curling iron and wands!
customer_reviews.text: Bought this to get thick, wavy, loose curls and it does the job! Most complained about the heat and it not having the plastic covered tip to hold on to but it doesnt affect me because of the way i use it (i hold my hair on the end since i used it as a wand essentially). The interchangeable parts are very easy to change out and lock in place. Heats up quickly. I do sometimes accidentally hit the buttons. So far so good!
customer_reviews.author: Cheyenne

customer_reviews.title: Returned Right Away
customer_reviews.text: I attempted to use this as one of my favorite YouTube beauty bloggers uses this item. I returned it after the first use. The temperature gauge would randomly go on and off, which is super dangerous. It does get extremely hot but without the safety of knowing it will stay on or off, I can't risk it.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Barrel is really short but works well.
customer_reviews.text: Pretty good product for the price. It gets hotter lower than what you would think. It gets hot at at the plastic part instead of just the barrel so it takes some getting used to and is a little difficult to use. Still nonetheless gives decent curls. Another thing is that the barrels are a little shorter than average so it’s harder to do longer hair. Or at least will take longer. Does the job but takes some getting used to.
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer

customer_reviews.title: Great quality & great customer service
customer_reviews.text: Originally I was going to give this 4 stars, because when I received mine I tried all the barrels and the largest one did not lock in correctly. I emailed the seller and they were prompt with a response and are in the process of sending me a replacement barrel right now! The wand heats up quickly, is easy to handle, the perfect size, and I'm definitely a huge fan of their customer service!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Love!
customer_reviews.text: Product came in a very nicely packaged and sealed box and the presentation is wonderful! Comes in a super awesome zip up bag that fits all the accessories. I love the heat selection you have from 270 to 410. It gets hot quick and cools off quick. Super easy to use and holds a curl. The extension of the cord is long and I love that. The glove fits perfectly and is easy to use with this product. I definitely recommend this especially for fast mornings and when you’re in a rush. Super awesome product. I love the different curls I can get with all of the accessories.
customer_reviews.author: Haley Evans

customer_reviews.title: I love it
customer_reviews.text: Wow very nice. Love it exactly what I wanted, lots of options. I love that I can curl without the cord being twirled. It doesn't have a tip to touch while you curl, which I knew when I bought it, but still burned myself once or twice haha. It comes in a really nice box and it just looks so sleek I love it. I would recommend it.
customer_reviews.author: McKenzie Stolarczyk

customer_reviews.title: Barrels to short for really long hair
customer_reviews.text: Heats up quickly. The barrels area little too short for my hair, if I would have known I would have order a different product. I have really long hair, and it TAKES FOREVER to curl. Plus I burnt my neck trying to use it - Not the products fault - but definitely makes me shy away from using it,. It did come very quickly, and the carrying case is super nice to have, plus the glove. Its a really solid product, just not efficient for the length and thickness of my hair.
customer_reviews.author: Liz

customer_reviews.title: Great curling iron if you don't need a cool touch tip.
customer_reviews.text: Everything about this curling iron is great. I love all the different attachments. It heats up fast and is super hot. It is just very hard to get used to not having the cool touch tip. I have used the glove but still feel the heat when I forget and place my hand on the end the curling iron. Can't use this on a day to day basis because I am afraid that I will forget to wear the glove and get a good burn. If you are used to using a curling iron without a cool touch tip on the end than this is a perfect iron for you.
customer_reviews.author: C32903

customer_reviews.title: Great product, highly recommend
customer_reviews.text: The ceramic that these barrels are made of is phenomenal. I have naturally curly/wavy hair and I like to polish them off using a curling iron. This curling iron is amazing. I will curl my hair in the morning, not use any product except a heat protectant in my hair. There are still curls in my hair by the end of the day, and if I go to sleep on them, I still have full ringlet curls in my hair. This is the best curling iron I've owned. The ceramic also doesn't let my hair catch in it the way my old ones did so I have way less damage done when I curl also.
customer_reviews.author: Kelsey Kay

customer_reviews.title: Amazing!!!
customer_reviews.text: This is my second purchase. I travel a lot for work so I use 1 for travel, 1 for home. Very easy to use and not burn your hair. The clip is strong to hold your long hair! Definitely recommend this one!
customer_reviews.author: SS

customer_reviews.title: Nope
customer_reviews.text: I wish I would of read the description better. There isn't a heat protection tip. So I get to burn my hands. Also I have baby fine hair and it grips the loose tendrils poorly. Will give away. And do my homework better on another brand.
customer_reviews.author: Samsam

customer_reviews.title: BURNT MYSELF TOO MANY TIMES
customer_reviews.text: Well, guess times have changed. Was a professional stylist 25 years but never owned curling irons without a safety tip. As mentioned above...Burnt myself too many times. Therefore, this set is being donated to Hospice Thrift. Good Luck
customer_reviews.author: Linny

customer_reviews.title: Great item and makes having 5 different irons easy with ...
customer_reviews.text: Great item and makes having 5 different irons easy with less space. I will say one of the barrels the plastic housing that slipped into the handle had a little extra piece of plastic that wouldn't let the locking dial turn just had to be scraped off of the base. So if you can get the lock to turn feel on the part that inserts into the handle for an extra little nub of plastic and just scrape it down with a razor blade and it will lock into the handle. Other than that I love it.
customer_reviews.author: Adam S

customer_reviews.title: Deal!!!
customer_reviews.text: These irons are fantastic and curl hard to curl hair with ease. The curls hold ALL day. These are some GREAT IRONS!,,
customer_reviews.author: Foxy

customer_reviews.title: The stand is an issue
customer_reviews.text: I actually returned this item because the part used to hold up the curling iron so it doesn't burn the counter are very loose and touch the curling iron so they in turn get really hot so when you curl your hair beware of touching it. It can burn your counter as well because it heats up as well. I didn't like the safety hazard so I sent them back.
customer_reviews.author: Lisa M

customer_reviews.title: Best Thing Ever
customer_reviews.text: I love this 5 pc curling iron. It has all the sizes u would need. Easily changeable. Not to mention nicely packaged. Comes in travel bag, with heat glove in a nice black box. Heats up fast, cools down in a couple minutes. I am so happy I bought this, I threw out all my old curling irons. This is all u need. Thanks 😃
customer_reviews.author: MG

customer_reviews.title: Great Curling Iron with all of the Choices You Could Want
customer_reviews.text: This curling iron is terrific and choices without buying multiple irons. It gives me all of the possibilities of curling in one very nice slim box. It also includes a heating protection glove that isn't in the picture. It seems to heat to just the perfect temperature. It doesn't burn the ends of my hair like previous curling irons I've used. I'm not sure how that works, but I'm thrilled. I had a problem with the first one I got and they immediately sent me a postage return label and offered a refund or replacement. I can't remember the last time I've had the immediate and professional help from a company.
customer_reviews.author: Tall Blonde in CA

customer_reviews.title: Must have, quality and price
customer_reviews.text: This is the end time I have purchased this because I left mine in a hotel but this is a great buy. I use mine all the time and have tried other brands simi8priced but this one has quality connectors and very easy to change barrels. Heats quickly and really holds up to regular use! Great price and quality iron set.
customer_reviews.author: Michael & Tamara T.

customer_reviews.title: Throw out all of those other wands and curlers! This thing is amazing!
customer_reviews.text: Okay! This purchase is SERIOUSLY the COOLEST!!! I was skeptical about how the pieces would attach to the base, but everything has been SO EASY to use!!! I love that it came with the little glove - this has kept me from burning my hand when using the wand. I just love that I have so many options but DON'T have to buy so many different full wands or curlers! The heat is great and works amazing on my hair (which usually doesn't hold a curl!) I will definitely be getting some more of these as gifts :) But I definitely won't need to buy any other curler or wand again! LOVE!!!
customer_reviews.author: Chad B.

customer_reviews.title: Great curling iron!
customer_reviews.text: I needed a large barrel curling iron. I hadn't bought one in well over a decade and was intrigued when I saw all the new multi barrel options. This one heats quicky and curls well. The power and temp control buttons are in a pretty bad place as it's easy to turn the iron off while using it. But overall I'm happy with my purchase.
customer_reviews.author: tlatrice

customer_reviews.title: My Favorite Tool
customer_reviews.text: I have owned this product for a good 5 years or so and I love it. Both my sister-in-laws loved it too so one bought and I gifted the other!
customer_reviews.author: Yesenia Bearden

customer_reviews.title: This curling iron is great! I can get lots of different types of ...
customer_reviews.text: This curling iron is great! I can get lots of different types of curls with each one and it's awesome! The only thing I have to complain about is that the barrels are kinda small and I have pretty long hair so I have to jam my hair onto these things to curl a whole strand of hair. If you have medium to short length hair I think the size would be perfect for you. Other then that, it is a great product.
customer_reviews.author: Clint Farley

customer_reviews.title: Black Coating Flakes Off
customer_reviews.text: I really loved these tongs (easy to use, heat up quickly, brilliant assortment of interchangeable heads) and have happily used them for a year now. Unfortunately, I recently started noticing black flakes in my hair after using them and I’ve realised the black coating on the barrel I use most has started flaking off! Very disappointing for a product that really isn’t very old.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Waves, Curls, you name it!
customer_reviews.text: For its price, you can’t beat it. The packaging was nice, the bag that came with it is perfect for traveling. I haven’t gotten to use all of the extensions but the one inch wand works wonderfully! Can’t wait to try the other ones. It heats up to 410 on a digital display, doesn’t take forever to cool down. Overall, I love this product!
customer_reviews.author: Amy

customer_reviews.title: It’s a steal for sure
customer_reviews.text: Love the simplicity of this! Very easy to swap between each barrel. I was seriously surprised on the quality of this item when I received it in the mail. My only complaint is on one of the curling iron barrels, the clip that holds your hair isn’t very tight against the barrel so my hair slips through. I also found that the locking mechanism that keeps the barrel in place will not unlock until the barrel has cooled down slightly. Very user friendly. The handle is the perfect size for your hand. The price is a steal for what you’re getting.
customer_reviews.author: FreshSav

customer_reviews.title: Not crazy about it, OUCH
customer_reviews.text: I'm not crazy about this. It runs hotter than I like and there is no control. I managed to give myself a nice burn on the front of the shoulder after a very brief contact with the tip. Note--the tips are not protected! So, I'm using a different, safer, more controllable wand most of the time. In it's favor it is versatile. I do find the large diameter, short attachment useful, so I will keep the product for a while. But it may go up on eBay sooner rather than later.
customer_reviews.author: Erica J

customer_reviews.title: Not safe
customer_reviews.text: Everything was working fine until 7 months later the hot screw from the clip becomes lose goes shooting out almost hitting my sister and the clip piece almost burned me as well. Although the curls this curler makes are beautiful it is not safe.
customer_reviews.author: Mary D.

customer_reviews.title: Purchase The Warranty
customer_reviews.text: I loved this product and it worked well for me for three years until it stopped working. Unfortunately, I didn't buy a warranty so if I want a refund I have to contact the manufacturer. If you're considering buying this product I recommend a warranty as mine no longer turns on after only three years. I've had other heat products that still work after 10+ years and cost less than this one, it is upsetting that it stopped working so quickly.
customer_reviews.author: Alex

customer_reviews.title: A lot of options at an affordable rate!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this hoping to have a curling wand that could give me slightly larger curls. After looking through the various sets, this one had good reviews and was the most affordable. I curled my hair with it though and the curls only applied to the end of my hair. I use a curling wand often and was disappointed with the results of the larger wand. The smaller wand works great, but I bought this solely for the use of the larger wands, which only curl the ends of my hair. I was impressed with the packaging though.
customer_reviews.author: Cailin

customer_reviews.title: ... this a 5 if the curling irons had a cool touch tip
customer_reviews.text: I would have given this a 5 if the curling irons had a cool touch tip. I get that it comes with a glove, but who wants to try and do their hair with a glove on? It takes me twice as long, and it's just a hot mess trying to get ready with these without the cool touch at the end of the curling irons. HUGE design mistake when making these.
customer_reviews.author: erin e.

customer_reviews.title: Great item although the instructions are poor
customer_reviews.text: Love this curling iron. The listing said that it was automatic shut off, which is one reason for my purchase. The instructions don't say anything about that so I'm hoping that is true. In fact the instructions are very limited and poor. You do have to use that glove because the end tip gets very hot. Love the idea that I can change tube sizes so I don't have to bother with multiple curling irons.
customer_reviews.author: Gerry

customer_reviews.title: I bought this 7 months ago and it is not ...
customer_reviews.text: I bought this 7 months ago and it is not working today. The window turns on and shows err and then shuts off. I did not buy the warranty so if you purchase this product you need to purchase the warranty! Update .... It is turning on again. I think some moisture got into the device.
customer_reviews.author: Mamazon

customer_reviews.title: Good at the discounted price
customer_reviews.text: Love how I am able to change the heads of the iron to customize my curls. The product comes in a heat resistant bag and fits all the tools comfortable and it comes with a heat resistant glove as well. I was disappointed that there was only a on/off button and no way to adjust temperature. I felt like it was a little bit too hot for my hair and burnt it a little. I also felt that the tip should have a base to hold but these do not. As I got these from a huge sale, about $30, I think it was a great purchase for the price. But I would not recommend these at their original price.
customer_reviews.author: Rita Chen

customer_reviews.title: Solid quality
customer_reviews.text: Heats up fast, and very hot. You definitely need to wear the glove, which is included. High heat holds curls all day, even with my thick coarse hair. It's not easy to change between wands, and it's nigh impossible to change a wand while its hot. So although the concept of having the ability to change wands while styling your hair is a great idea, forget about it - -even when wearing the glove and wrapping the wand in a towel.
customer_reviews.author: L. Hetherington

customer_reviews.title: AMAZING CURLS
customer_reviews.text: Literally the BEST curling irons I have ever used. My hair is thick, heavy, and never have I ever (even with heavy holding hairspray) had curls last more than 45min in my hair without falling out back to straight. This curling iron set, even on the largest barrel for bigger curls, has curled my hair in a way that it stays ALL day. Hours. I am in awe of this, and that it wasn't even super expensive. If you need long lasting curls, have the thick or long hair difficulty, and are giving up hope, GET THIS! It is so worth it.
customer_reviews.author: Hillargh

customer_reviews.title: Great space saver!!
customer_reviews.text: I love this curling iron!! I have a small bathroom so having multiple curling irons takes up all my storage space. This curling iron takes up vey little space. The negative to having only one base is that I have to pick which curling iron I want and have to us that one the whole time. If I do diced that I need a different top I have to wait until it cools to switch heads. Definitely a pain. But rarely do I need to used different sizes so I am very happy with my purchase!
customer_reviews.author: AIM2284

customer_reviews.title: Love
customer_reviews.text: I love it. Packaging was nice. I love the varying case. Heats up fast and gets the job done. The glove is handy. I would definitely recommend this product to anyone looking for an affordable curling iron . The best part is having 5 different size curls to choose from.
customer_reviews.author: Lele

customer_reviews.title: This gets VERY hot and there is no way to ...
customer_reviews.text: This gets VERY hot and there is no way to adjust the temperature. I thought that I would get used to not having the plastic tip to hold on to, but I can't. I have burned my hand so many times. No auto-shut off.
customer_reviews.author: Jules33

customer_reviews.title: It looks like a nice set and if you buy it you ...
customer_reviews.text: It looks like a nice set and if you buy it you will just learn to work with it. The heat cannot be adjusted. If you have short to medium length hair like I do, You will probably just use two of the barrels. If your hair is longer maybe you may use all. It could use some smaller sizes for someone with short hair. The way the irons are designed you will need to get accustomed to the style so you can use it. If I had to purchase again, I wouldn't purchase, but as I said, if you do you will have to work with it.
customer_reviews.author: Fabulous

customer_reviews.title: The protective glove has saved me several painful burns. Awesome value for your money with this ...
customer_reviews.text: I wanted the versatility of a curling iron and curling wand and that is exactly what this item does. I am new to curling my hair and haven't quite got the hang of a curling wand yet. The protective glove has saved me several painful burns. Awesome value for your money with this one.
customer_reviews.author: M_fromTX

customer_reviews.title: Mixed reviews
customer_reviews.text: I really like this product. My only Complaint is that the handle gets really hot where you insert each interchangeable part, so you have to be very careful or you will burn yourself. That kind of freaks me out so I wear the heat glove that came with it and that helps. besides that it curls very nicely.
customer_reviews.author: Andrea

customer_reviews.title: Not for those who have difficulty using hands
customer_reviews.text: Item was difficult to snap together and take apart for me. I have arthritis in my hands and I could not control my use of the sections and taking apart for storage was very difficult.
customer_reviews.author: hrgal46

customer_reviews.title: Best curling wand ever!
customer_reviews.text: I ended up going with this one for a few reasons: It's very easy, and versatile! This is the best bang for your buck! My hair looks like it came out of the salon, and it only took me less than 20 mins! The heat glove works wonders, and saves me on buying a new one... since it's already included! Professional packaging! Heats up very quick.
customer_reviews.author: Natalia

customer_reviews.title: Love this and fast shipping
customer_reviews.text: Omg I was browsing amazon for a skew of things and I came across this interchangeable curling iron system. I am a beautician and it is hard to impress me with certain tools for the hair. This ceramic iron is great. From the packaging to the quality of the product. I love it. Immediately tried in on my hair and I have extensions in and with no product it curled instantly. It even comes with a travel case I don't remember reading that in the description. It I'm glad I made this purchase. You get 5 stars from me!!
customer_reviews.author: LaTeshia

customer_reviews.title: Great set of curling tools a must buy
customer_reviews.text: Love this beautiful set of curlers just used it today the curls are beautiful and lasting even in this summer heat shipping was fast arrives very secure in an outer box and inside this beautiful sturdy gift giving black box very classy all women should have this set really great for the money worth every penny will have to order another xtava did a great job with this product very happy with my purchase
customer_reviews.author: E. Scott

customer_reviews.title: Modified review
customer_reviews.text: While the curling iron works well, because there is no safety tip and no heat adjustment I have burned my fingers a number of times and my neck and head three time, severely! I threw this away finally as being a dangerous tool. I bought a cheaper curling iron that adjusts just as hot but has a safety tip that is not hot and am so much happier with that choice. I do not recommend this product to anyone!!
customer_reviews.author: Linda F

customer_reviews.title: I have thick hair and I love how quickly it curls my hair
customer_reviews.text: Why didn't I get this sooner? It has made traveling so much easier. Instead of packing 2 or 3 different curling irons, I just throw this in the sleek case and have all the options I need to curl my hair in a convenient carrier. I have thick hair and I love how quickly it curls my hair. My old curling iron would take 25+ minutes to curl my entire head but this take 10 minutes top. Seriously wish I would have purchased a long time ago!
customer_reviews.author: CourtneyODaniel

customer_reviews.title: Great product!
customer_reviews.text: This set is GREAT! It comes with a bag so you can put all the pieces in one carrying case. The sizes of the curling irons probably goes up to 1.5 inches. Gets nice and hot. So great to have interchangeable curling iron heads... I'll never go back! I just tossed all the other ones I had! :) Simplify, ladies!
customer_reviews.author: Elizabeth Hill

customer_reviews.title: Don't Get Burned
customer_reviews.text: I've had the same experience. No temperature control with an excessively hot iron. Yesterday I burned my hand and it's blistering today. The "curls" it produces are more like jagged chevron designs in my hair, and frying it within seconds. And by the way, I have thick hair. I was going to donate it to the local thrift shop, but I don't want anyone to get burned like I did purchasing this piece of garbage. And that's just where it's going.
customer_reviews.author: webster

customer_reviews.title: Perfect!
customer_reviews.text: I absolutely love this set. I curl my hair once a week so this set is great for my needs. Love the options and the price. Handy storage bag perfect for me since this isn't out ever day
customer_reviews.author: HaCo

customer_reviews.title: Great Curler
customer_reviews.text: I tried this out as soon as I got it and fell in love immediately. Changing the size of the curling barrel is simple and I love the fact that you can securely lock the barrel in. I had never curled my own hair before but quickly learned the ins and outs with this wonderful curler. The swivel base makes it that much easier to maneuver and the metal base stands make it so I don't have to worry when I set the curler down. My hair hates to be curled but with this curler my hair has held the wave much longer than usual and I am very happy with my purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Katie Elliott-Wiley

product_meta.title: 5 in 1 Professional Curling Iron and Wand Set - 0.3 to 1.25 Inch Interchangeable Ceramic Barrel Wand Curling Iron - Dual Voltage Hair Curler Set for All Hair Types with Glove and Travel Case by Xtava
feature_bullets: 5 IN 1 CURLING IRON SET - This curling iron kit includes a 0.3 - 0.75 inch tapered clipless barrel, a 0.7 - 1 inch tapered clipless barrel, a 0.7 - 1 inch barrel with a clamp, a 1 inch barrel with a clamp, a 1.25 inch barrel with a clamp, plus a heat resistant glove. Unlike many curling irons, each Xtava barrel does not have a cool tip, which enhances the maximum curling surface area

TOURMALINE CERAMIC TECHNOLOGY - This set provides the best styling results by producing negative ions to seal moisture, protect cuticles, and reduce hair static and frizz. The ceramic coating provides a shinier, healthier finish to reduce hair loss and damage, without pulling on the hair

DIGITAL TEMPERATURE CONTROL - Each high-powered, styling tool with 9 precise temperature settings features an easy to read, digital LCD screen, which displays the temperature between 250ºF – 410ºF degrees. Suitable for all hair types from short, medium, and long hair to thin, fine, normal, thick, and coarse hair

DUAL VOLTAGE and AUTO SHUT OFF - The user-friendly design features a universal, dual voltage of 110 - 240V AC that adjusts automatically to the proper voltage when used with a compatible adapter. With a 60 minute automatic shut off function, quick heating technology, and an 8 foot 360 degree swivel cord, this set has it all

2-YEAR WARRANTY AND MONEY BACK GUARANTEE - Professional curling wave iron with 5 interchangeable barrels, a zip travel case, and a heat protective glove. It makes your curl beauty style easier and more convenient, and works as a great gift to send to friends or family. Please be advised, we have a 2-year warranty and money back guarantee
